title: صنعتوں میں فرسٹ ایڈ، مصنوعی سانس اور سی پی آر
content: (عنوان کی سلائیڈ کے لیے اضافی مواد نہیں)
image_desc: A person giving CPR to another person.
narration: Welcome to Electrical Rojgar channel! Today, we'll discuss first aid, artificial respiration, and CPR in detail.  We'll cover the importance of first aid, different artificial respiration techniques, and the steps involved in performing CPR.

title: صنعتوں میں فرسٹ ایڈ کی اہمیت
content:
فوری امداد
زندگی بچانا
اعتماد میں اضافہ
narration: Industrial accidents and health emergencies can happen anytime.  Knowing first aid and artificial respiration techniques is crucial. First aid provides immediate relief, preventing worsening conditions. In serious cases, it can be life-saving, for example, in cases of heavy bleeding or difficulty breathing.  Knowing first aid also builds confidence in responding to emergencies.

image_desc: Close-up of various items in a first aid kit.
narration: Every industry should have a first aid kit.  It should include antiseptic, bandages, gauze pads, tape, scissors, gloves, pain relievers, antihistamines, a thermometer, a CPR mask, and eye wash solution.

title: عام فرسٹ ایڈ کی صورتحال اور علاج
content: (Content incorporated into the image caption below)
image_desc: An infographic showing common injuries (bleeding, burns, wounds, sprains) and their basic first aid treatments.
narration: Let's look at some common first aid situations. Bleeding: apply pressure, bandage, elevate. Burns: cool water rinse, bandage, avoid oils or creams. Wounds: rest, ice, bandage, pain relief. Sprains: rest, ice, compression, elevation. Poisoning: call emergency services immediately, wash affected area, do not induce vomiting. Difficulty breathing: sit comfortably, call emergency services, be ready for artificial respiration. Heart attack: call emergency services, start CPR. Shock: lie down, elevate legs, keep warm, call emergency services.

title: فرسٹ ایڈ کے ABCs
content:
A - ایئر وے: ایئر وے کو کھلا رکھیں۔
B - سانس لینا: سانس کی جانچ کریں۔
C - سرکولیشن: سرکولیشن کی جانچ کریں۔
image_desc: A diagram illustrating the ABCs of first aid.
narration: Remember the ABCs of first aid: Airway, Breathing, Circulation.  First, check the airway, ensuring it's clear. Then, check breathing. Finally, check circulation. This systematic approach helps prioritize life-saving steps.

title: مصنوعی سانس لینے کی تکنیکیں
content:
منہ سے منہ کے ذریعے بحالی
منہ سے ناک کے ذریعے بحالی
ایمبو بیگ (بیگ ماسک وینٹیلیشن)
image_desc: Illustrations demonstrating each of the artificial respiration techniques.
narration: Artificial respiration, also called rescue breathing, is essential when someone isn't breathing adequately.  We'll cover mouth-to-mouth, mouth-to-nose, and using an Ambu bag.  Remember, these techniques should be performed by trained individuals.

title: سی پی آر (کارڈیوپلمونری ریسسیٹیشن)
content:
چیسٹ کمپریشنز: ہر سائیکل میں 30 کمپریشنز
ریسکیو سانس: ہر سائیکل میں 2 سانسیں
30:2 کا تناسب
image_desc: A diagram showing correct hand placement for chest compressions during CPR.
narration: CPR is a life-saving technique used when the heart stops beating or someone stops breathing. It involves chest compressions and rescue breaths, a 30:2 ratio.  Call emergency services immediately.

title: سی پی آر کا طریقہ کار
content: (Content incorporated into the image caption below)
image_desc: A step-by-step infographic illustrating the CPR procedure.
narration: The CPR procedure involves ensuring safety, checking responsiveness, calling for help, performing chest compressions, giving rescue breaths, and repeating until help arrives or the person starts breathing again.  Continuous monitoring is crucial.

title: اختتام اور اگلا ویڈیو
content:
فرسٹ ایڈ، مصنوعی سانس اور سی پی آر کی اہمیت پر زور دیا گیا۔
اگلے ویڈیو کا موضوع: فضلہ کی صفائی اور پی پی ای۔
